reviewDetails.comment: He was very helpful. He went beyond my immediate medical needs, and helped me with related matters that I had not originally sought his help with. Very helpful, competent doctor. I recommend him.
Happy with the doctor. Excellent care
I have visited Dr. Gratch for several years on a regular basis. He is very knowledgeable, and is part of a team of dermatologists with extensive expertise.
Dr. Gratch is very professional, the clinic is running efficiently.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Pereira is an excellent orthopedic surgeon.  He performed very successful arthroscopic surgery on my knees . He is thorough, attentive and caring. He is also honest and doesn't oversell . If he does not believe a procedure will be successful, he tells you so and will not perform it.
Professional. Courteous. Friendly. Detailed. I would highly recommend Doc Pereira!
Dr. Pereira is professional with great bedside manner. He takes time to properly diagnose and treat his patients.
He is a very patient and kind doctor. He explains all your options in layman terms. I have already recommended him to a family member and will again.
A professional, well knowledgeable and kind Dr.

reviewDetails.comment: For the first 30 seconds that we interacted, I thought Dr. Haglof was going to be stern and dour.  I was wrong.  She is delightful to deal with!  She took an extremely thorough history from me, we talked about all my pending issues, and her staff took loads of blood.  I felt really confident in her analyses.  Once the blood work came back she explained all my results, remembered all the details I'd told her and formulated a really good plan to coordinate with my other doctors and monitor me over the next several months.  It's only been two visits so far but I am very pleased.
Dr. Haglof is a wonderful hematologist.  She is very thorough and is great with following up.
Professional, very thorough and good listener.
Dr. Haglof is an awesome doctor. I love her.
